hopobject.name: AQUABOT
hopobject.pname: Photography By Automated Under Water Robot
hopobject.body: I have designed an under water robot that captures the images of under water aquatic life. The sensors are interfaced to get data of under water conditions. the robot also has an access through web page designed to control the robot. The IP of beagle bone black is used to access the robot through web browser.
hopobject.shortdesc: Under Water, Marine Photography, Marine Environment Study
